name: Babel: Choice
description: Babel: Choice is a 2D action-adventure Roguelike game which combines with the elements of RPG and shooting games. In the game, the player will play the part of Alexander, the son of the evil duke, aiming to break through the perilous and capricious Tower of Evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: I am either a ♥♥♥♥♥♥, or this game is impossible to play.  Could be both.  Don't buy.
